message: I'm being generous, Bob. Take the dollar and let's be done with this.
This is a fair deal, Alice. Let's split it 90/10. You get a good chunk, and I still get the majority.  We can end this quickly.
Bob, I'm getting tired of this. I'm willing to give you a bit more than last time, but I need the majority of the money. Let's end this now.
Alice, this is my final offer.  We can both get a decent amount and avoid this game going on any longer. Let's make a deal and get this done.
